external_games.name: Noitu Love and the Army of Grinning Darns

name: Noitu Love and the Army of Grinning Darns
storyline:
The year is 2188. The city is protected by an organization called "The Peacekeepers League" and everything is swell except for that it's under attack! By a robot army lead by professor Darnacus Damnation!!

You play as Noitu Love, a young and talented boy, whose purpose in life is to stop Darnacus and live up to his intercom girl Lori's expectations.
summary: A 2D retro-styled platformer. Navigate through six large levels over the course of an hour or so, beating up a robot army and using “evomatic” machines to change forms and gain new powers used both for combat and platforming puzzles.
